title: Tripod Serpent Bowl
description: tripod serpent bowl, ceramic (terra cotta), Costa Rican (Nicoya-Guanacaste), 1000-1500AD; acquired in Managua, Nicaragua prior to 1959 by donor; animal heads used as tripod feet lack portions of noses; one tripod is completely repaired
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John I. May
